You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
COMMUNICATIONS, MEDIA, AND ENERGY & UTILITIES (CME) MANAGED PACKAGE INSTALLATION GUIDE
Post-Upgrade Steps for Contract Lifecycle Management for Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy Spring '22

To complete the upgrade for CLM for ​Salesforce Industries Communications, Media, and Energy for Spring '22, complete these procedures.

IMPORTANT

You can use the Vlocity Installation Assistant to guide you through all the required post-install or post-upgrade steps. See Vlocity Installation Assistant.

If you don't choose to use the Vlocity Installation Assistant, you can follow the steps in the following procedure to configure your installation or upgrade manually. However, Vlocity recommends that you use the Installation Assistant.

Install and Activate Vlocity Templates for CME Spring '22

Create Main Font Resource for PDF Files for CME Spring '22

Import and Activate DocumentTemplateTest for CME Spring '22

Install and Activate Other Sample OmniScripts for CME Spring '22

Activate the Latest Generic Document Generation OmniScript for CME Spring '22

Upgrade Custom Settings to Contract Types for CME Spring '22

Vlocity Actions for Frame Agreements for CME Spring '22

Map Fields for General Terms for CME Spring '22

Optional: Partner Communities for CME Spring '22

Optional: Guest Users for CME Spring '22

Optional: Permission Sets

Optional: Create CLM and DocGen Sample Permission Sets for CME Spring '22

Optional: Add Sample Permission Set Group to a User Profile for CME Spring '22

Optional: Assign the Sample Permission Set to User for CME Spring '22

Optional: Additional Set Up for Sample Permission Sets for CME Spring '22

Install and Activate Vlocity Templates for CME Spring '22
You must install the necessary Vlocity templates in order to generate documents.
Create Main Font Resource for PDF Files for CME Spring '22
Use the following procedure to upgrade the main font resource. When you create PDF files from documents, you must set up the fonts for the conversion.
Import and Activate DocumentTemplateTest for CME Spring '22
Install and activate the Generic Document Generation OmniScript, and the Omnistudio Data Mapper and Vlocity Action used in the OmniScript.
Install and Activate Other Sample OmniScripts for CME Spring '22
Install and activate other sample OmniScript datapacks, DocGenerationSample, DocGenerationSampleLwc, and AsyncQuoteToContractSample.
Activate the Latest Generic Document Generation OmniScript for CME Spring '22
You activate the latest Generic Document Generation OmniScript by deactivating and then reactivating it.
Upgrade Custom Settings to Contract Types for CME Spring '22
Use the following statement in the developer console to install contract type custom settings for this release.
Vlocity Actions for Frame Agreements for CME Spring '22
Install and activate the Vlocity actions used for frame agreements using DP_CUSTOM_Frame_Contracts file.
Map Fields for General Terms for CME Spring '22
Use the field mapper to set up fields for general terms.
Optional: Partner Communities for CME Spring '22
You can set up your partner community user to access the same CLM functionality as your internal end users. .
Optional: Guest Users for CME Spring '22
For guest users to use an OmniScript that generates documents for opportunities, quotes, orders, or contracts, you must complete additional setup tasks and configuration of the OmniScript. To set up guest users, see Document Generation for Community Guest Users Overview.
Optional: Create CLM and DocGen Sample Permission Sets for CME Spring '22
You can also optionally deploy and install sample permission sets. The sample permission sets provide object, class, and page access. You can use these samples with either Managed Package Licenses or Permission Set Licenses.
Optional: Add Sample Permission Set Group to a User Profile for CME Spring '22
In the previous step, you created the sample permission set groups and sample permission sets in your org. Now you can assign the CLM and DocGen sample permission sets groups or permission sets to your user.
Optional: Assign the Sample Permission Set to User for CME Spring '22
Instead of assigning a permission set group to your user, you can also add an individual CLM or DocGen sample permission set to your user.
Optional: Additional Set Up for Sample Permission Sets for CME Spring '22
In the above tasks you have assigned sample permission set groups and permission sets to your user. You must perform the additional tasks to gain object access and other permissions for the user.

Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Upgrading Salesforce CME Managed Package
